title:
Slow Cooker Bacon Macaroni and
Cheese
directions: In an oval slow cooker (I used my 3 quart slow cooker) evenly lay the the
uncooked macaroni noodles. Pour the water and the cream over the top of
powder, paprika, liquid smoke and bacon over the top.
3. Cover and cook on HIGH for 80-90
4. Remove lid and gently stir. Add in grated cheese
and gently stir until it’s all melted.
5. Optional and really awesome: turn on your oven to
broil. Spread Panko bread crumbs on a cookie sheet and place under the
broiler until toasted. It will take only a few minutes so make sure you
watch it and don’t let it burn.
serving bowls. Top with a tablespoon of crumbled bacon and a tablespoon
ingredients: 3 oz grated cheddar cheese (sharp will give more flavor but medium and mild work too)
